front.title: Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping/Trace Reply Mode Simplification

abstract.t: This document adds one reply mode to indicate reverse LSP, to be used by Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping and Traceroute. This document also adds an optional TLV which can carry ordered list of reply modes. This document updates [RFC4379].
